std.value: It was a sunny day, so Fangfang decided to take her pet dog to her neighborhood park. In the park, Fangfang saw many people there and some were playing with a ball. She found a patch of grass and then sat down with the dog to enjoy the sunshine. Other people in the park also had a good time there. At that moment, Fangfang noticed a man smoking, with a baby and a mother and others sitting nearby. Fangfang went over to the man and told him not to smoke in public, especially when with others. It was impolite and also bad for health. The man felt sorry for that and others thanked Fangfang for her awareness of public welfare.

std.value: It was a sunny day, so Fangfang decided to take her pet dog to her neighborhood park. There were many people having a good time. Some were hanging out with friends and some kids were playing ball games. Fangfang found a good place to sit down and relax. She was enjoying the sunshine when she felt an unusual pat on her lap. It was her dog. He was restless. Something seemed to be wrong. She looked around and saw a man smoking while a baby near him was crying. Fangfang immediately went over to the man and reminded him not to smoke in public area. Her dog barked as if he agreed, too. The man's face turned red and put out the cigarette.

std.value: It was a sunny day, so Fangfang decided to take her pet dog to her neighborhood park. The park was packed with families and friends who seemed to be enjoying themselves. The sun shone brightly and the flowers were gently swaying in the breeze. Fangfang sat comfortably with her dog next to her. Everything was perfect until she heard a piercing cry. It was from a baby. Fangfang wondered what had happened to the baby until she spotted a man nearby with a lighted cigarette. Without hesitation, she headed towards the man and told him not to smoke in public. The man was ashamed and walked away. The baby's mother smiled at Fangfang and she was happy.

std.value: It was a sunny day, so Fangfang decided to take her pet dog to her neighborhood park. As she entered, she saw a group of people playing ball, their laughter and cheers filling the air. She found a cozy spot on the grass where she could sit and watch them play. Her dog seemed to enjoy the lively atmosphere as much as she did. However, her pleasant experience was suddenly interrupted when she noticed a young man smoking right next to a child. The sight immediately made her angry. How could someone be so careless and disrespectful? She knew that she couldn't just sit there and do nothing. She walked over to the young man and said firmly, "You shouldn't be smoking here. There are children around." The young man looked surprised at first but then realized his mistake. He apologized sincerely and promised never to smoke near children again.

std.value: It was a sunny day, so Fangfang decided to take her pet dog to her neighborhood park. People played a ball and soaked up the warm sun on the grass. However, their peaceful afternoon was disrupted when Fangfang saw a young man smoking right next to a child who was sleeping. She knew that she had to take action. With determination, she approached the young man and said sternly, "You shouldn't be smoking here. There are children around." The young man looked surprised at first but then he realized his mistake and apologized sincerely. He promised never to smoke near children again and thanked Fangfang for pointing it out.

std.value: It was a sunny day, so Fangfang decided to take her pet dog to her neighborhood park. Upon arriving, Fangfang were greeted by the cheerful sounds of people engaged in different sports and games. She chose a comfortable spot on the grass where she and her dog could relax. Suddendly her attention was drawn to a young man who was smoking right next to a little boy. The sight filled her with anger. How could someone be so thoughtless as to expose a child to second hand smoke? Without hesitation, she got up from the place on the grass and marched over to the young man. "You can't smoke here, especially not next to a child," She said firmly. The young man looked up, slightly taken aback by her directness. After a moment of silence, he responded with an apology. "I'm sorry, I didn't think about it. I won't do it again." His words felt sincere, and she hoped that he would keep his promise. With a final nod, she returned to her dog, feeling glad that she had spoken up.

With a final nod, she returned to her dog, feeling glad that she had spoken up.
